info.name: Dark DeviantArt 2019 (customizable colors)
info.description: 2019 UPDATE: Eclipse was a disappointment so I'm currently working on this again! If you want to donate you can use the Paypal button above, a lil' donation goes a long way! It really motivates me to work more on this when I see people appreciate the time and effort it takes to do this. I'm proud to present the most complete dark skin for Deviant Art! This is a much updated and improved skin based on LilyB's skin. You can customize the header bar colors (green by default) to any solid color or gradient that you want! For a solid color, set both gradient values the same. More customizable settings soon! Please rate the skin if you liked it so others can know this is good :P Enjoy! I also make music! Check out my SoundCloud here!
info.additionalInfo: Report an issue here, at the DeviantArt page, or at the GitHub page Latest Version: v0.9.1 (2019-10-22): Skinned the commissions and donation sections of the profile page. Improved contrast of several other profile sections. Full Version History Info at the GitHub page
